LanguageData.TurretBases_SettingsDegredationTooltip: Weapons degrades when shot by turret platform.
LanguageData.TurretBases_SettingsCanBreakTooltip: If enabled, mounted guns will keep shooting until they break, otherwise it will stop firing when too damaged.
LanguageData.TurretBases_SettingsBurstsToDestroyToolt: Number of bursts a weapon will last before breaking.
LanguageData.TurretBases_SettingsAllowBiocodedTooltip: Allow weapons that are biocoded to be mounted on turrets.
